Package controller

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SearchController
  • public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the logic that controls the search screen
    Author:
    Sreekar Vedula

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
